TRNSFRM:
date_diff(
        'month',
        -- Parse VERSMON as YYYYMM + '01' into a date
        strptime(VERSMON  || '01', '%Y%m%d'),
        -- Parse CALMONTH as YYYYMM + '01' into a date
        strptime(CALMONTH || '01', '%Y%m%d')
      )
